dataList.content:
Sopprimi l'Anormalità nelle modalità 'Facile' e 'Difficile' dell'Incontro Odio e Disperazione.

Ottieni varie ricompense completando le missioni.
Usa Fulmine Arcano per sopprimere il Cavaliere della Disperazione quando ha l'effetto 'Weathered Knight'
Completa l'Incontro con la Regina dell'Odio subendo meno di 3 colpi dalle Abilità Attacco nemiche
Completa l'Incontro senza che nessuna Spada di un Cavaliere Dimenticato torni in vita una o più volte dopo che sono state evocate
Completa l'Incontro con il Capitano della Squadra di Comando Centrale in vita e sconfiggendo 3 Spade con l'effetto 'Helpless Tears'
Completa l'Incontro con il Capitano della Squadra di Comando Centrale in vita e con 3+ Potenza Carica ('Carica Unica' inclusa)
Completa l'Incontro con il Capitano della Squadra di Comando Centrale in vita e che ha subito meno di 8 colpi dalle Abilità Attacco nemiche
In un Incontro, fà sì che l'Impiegato Modello della Squadra del Welfare infligga una certa quantità di Potenza Pianto o Lacerazione con le sue Abilità
Completa l'Incontro con l'Impiegato Modello della Squadra del Welfare in vita e che ha subito meno di 8 colpi dalle Abilità Attacco nemiche
Usa Abilità con Moneta Negativa un certo numero di volte in un Incontro
Completa l'Incontro senza morti alleate
Completa l'Incontro senza che nessuno degli alleati arrivi a -45 PS
Completa l'Incontro senza che nessun alleato accumuli 20 Cold, Black Tears
Usa Fulmine Arcano per per sopprimere il Cavaliere della Disperazione quando ha l'effetto 'Weathered Knight'
Completa l'Incontro con la Regina dell'Odio subendo meno di 3 colpi dalle Abilità Attacco nemiche
Complete the Encounter without letting Heart-breaking Sword, Heart-tearing Sword, and Heart-piercing Sword revive once or more after they are summoned
Complete the Encounter with the Central Command Team Captain surviving and defeating 3 Swords that have 'Helpless Tears'
Complete the Encounter with the Central Command Team Captain surviving and with 5+ Charge Potency (including 'Unique Charge')
Complete the Encounter with the Central Command Team Captain surviving and taking less than 5 hits from enemy Attack Skills
Have the Welfare Team Model Employee inflict a certain amount of Sinking or Rupture Potency with its Skills in an Encounter
Have the Welfare Team Model Employee clash against 'Heart-breaking Sword', 'Heart-tearing Sword', and 'Heart-piercing Sword' once, respectively, in an Encounter
Complete the Encounter with the Welfare Team Model Employee surviving and taking less than 5 hits from enemy Attack Skills
Use Minus Coin Skills a certain number of times in an Encounter
Clear Encounter without any ally deaths
Clear Encounter without any of the allies reaching -45 SP
Clear Encounter without any of the allies reaching 10 Cold, Black Tears
Complete all Missions in both Easy and Hard difficulties
Clear Easy Difficulty to Unlock
The 6th Walpurgis Night - Hatred and Despair
The 6th Walpurgis Night - Hatred and Despair
[The 6th Walpurgis Night - Hatred and Despair] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.
Event Period
The duration of The 6th Walpurgis Night event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.
Easy Difficulty Encounter

Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter. The Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry. On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 55 will be raised to Level 55. Also, any Deployed Identities and E.G.O under Tier 3 Uptie/Threadspinning Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.
Hard Difficulty Encounter
Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty. In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Central Command Team Captain Effects

The #1 Sinner in the Deployment order will be imbued with the 'Central Command Team Captain' effect. The Sinner with the 'Central Command Captain' effect will gain more Slots and other beneficial effects.
Welfare Team Model Employee Effects
The #2 Sinner in the Deployment order will be imbued with the 'Welfare Team Model Employee' effect. The Sinner with the 'Welfare Team Model Employee' effect will gain beneficial effects.
Missions
You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.
You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.
Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.
Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 6th Walpurgis Night - Hatred and Despair' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
Easy
Hard
Easy
Hard
Clear Easy Difficulty to Unlock
